column3: 1. How to upload Student picture in the front page of the report card?
2. After generating the report card, admission number is showing in place of roll number.
3. How to fill attendance in report card?
4. In calculation part the periodic test I & II having 40 marks that should be automatically converts in 10 marks but that is not converted it.
5. In final assessment calculation the totalling of Term I & Term II are taken 50 % but that is not calculated as per format.
6. Class Teacher remarks should be expand to till end of the pages.
Nur to KG- II - Purple colour border
Class 1 to 12 - Olive green colour border
